desc: A rarely seen blue beast pelt.

dictionary.lore: This blue pelt is found only on Mt. Wistorea in St. Lamia. It features a beautiful azure hue. Legend has it that when the Holy Queen of the ancient kingdom left for the battlefield, the crest she took with her was made from it. That crest raised vitality, and the troops that she led with it were thought to be immortal.

name: Azure Pelt
